casebody.data:
R.J. REYNOLDS TOBACCO COMPANY, et al., petitioners,
v.
Cheryl SEARCY, as Personal Representative of the Estate of Carol LaSard. No. 18-649. Supreme Court of the United States Feb. 25, 2019. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eleventh Circuit denied. Justice KAVANAUGH took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.
